price: ߡߊ߬ߛߎߘߎ߲ߧߊ ߟߋ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߦߴߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߒ߬ ߓߘߊ ߘߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߛߊ߬ߦߌ߲߬ ߦߌ߬ߟߊ߬ ߢߌߡߊ߫
arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
